ModMetaData.name: WarCasket Barbatos Gundam Addon (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Tach/XxHyde840xX
ModMetaData.description:
- Adds Gundam Barbatos WarCasket armour. Includes the iconic Mace, Katana, 300mm and Smoothbore Rifle as weapons.
- Movement speed offsets changed from a debuff to a buff. All armor pieces provide 0.25c/s move speed increase.
- Toxic Resistance and Environmental Toxic Resistance Values applied to all 4 pieces of armor.
-------------------------------------------
- This is considered a temporary upload.
- If the author wishes at any time to continue the project, or for me to remove it from the workshop, I will comply with their request.
- XxHyde840
